api_list.name: Countries and their latest update
api_list.description: We have the following endpoints Countries and their latest update
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-disease-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/covid-19-api/api/v1/countries.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-disease-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
